txt.en: Repairing the Bridges of Glyn Helyg
Ponta Gochelgar has asked you to cut down trees from which to make planks to repair the bridges.\n\nTrees can be found along the river below the cliffs of Glyn Helyg.
'Excellent! You brought back some fine pieces of wood! I can take it from here and have the planks made. Thank you for your help!'
Now that you have scouted the bridges of Glyn Helyg, work can be done to repair those that have suffered rot and weather-wear.
'Excellent! You brought back some fine pieces of wood! I can take it from here and have the planks made. Thank you for your help!'
You should bring the wood to Ponta.\n\nPonta Gochelgar is in Glyn Helyg.

'You bring good news! It sounds like we only need to repair a few planks. Will you cut down a few trees so we can have the planks made? You will have to go into the wooded area by the water. The trees on the cliffside all have their own names and we don't want to be going and cutting those down.'
